Headline: #146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near State/Lake
ShortDescription: NB 146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Wacker Place, and Michigan due to, street blockage near State/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Wacker Place, and Michigan due to, street blockage near State/Lake.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed near Clark/Lake
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing near Clark/Lake due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing near Clark/Lake due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
